elements.label: Maze of Stairs and Hallways
elements.description: <The library doesn't have a floor plan. It couldn't have one. Stairs and windowless hallways spring in all directions, seemingly without any logic. Yet, its visitors seem to always reach what they want, assuming they know what to look for. All around us, always at the periphery of our vision, groups of people are sitting, studying books, devices, debating in a river of whispers. And everywhere, the everpresent speckled light, flowing from the central well's network of mirrors.>

elements.label: Group of Students
elements.description: Here in a corner, sitting on comfy benches and armchairs, a group of people is vividly discussing some kind of parable. As they converse, spots of light keep drifting accross their faces, scintillating leaves in the golden afternoon of a sunflooded wood.
